<answer>The file 'team-meeting-minutes.docx' with ID '25' contains minutes from a team meeting held on May 17, 2024. The attendees were Emma Johnson, David Lee, Linda Green, and Mark Roberts. 

The meeting covered several key points:
1. Discussion of the new project's progress.
2. Review of marketing strategies and upcoming campaigns.
3. Examination of sales projections and customer feedback.

Action items assigned during the meeting include:
- David: Coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase by May 20, 2024.
- Linda: Email the 'meeting-agenda-2024-05-15.docx' file to John Mitchell for review by May 21, 2024.
- Mark: Review the sales projections and provide feedback by May 19, 2024.

The file is owned by Emma Johnson (emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com) and was last modified on May 6, 2024, at 10:30:00. It is shared with David Lee, Linda Green, Mark Roberts, and John Mitchell.</answer>
